basic.description: An examination of the principal features of Byzantine society from its foundation in Late Antiquity down to the mid-13th century. The political history of the Byzantine state will be studied alongside many of the characteristic features of Byzantine life, belief and culture.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: Byzantine Society, 330-1261

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    A Grade of C+ in 6.0 units from HIST 300-329 and registration in a HIST Major or Medial Plan.
